TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ManagementEventWatcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 根据指定的事件查询订阅临时事件通知。

span.span: Subscribes to temporary event notifications based on a specified *event query*.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示客户端如何接收通知的实例时**Win32_Process**由于事件类是创建**__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/cs/ManagementEventWatcher.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher/vb/ManagementEventWatcher.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 观察程序将侦听的事件的命名空间是当前设置的默认命名空间。The namespace in which the watcher will be listening for events is the default namespace that is currently set. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 在此代码示例中，客户端接收通知的实例时**Win32_Process**由于事件类是创建**__InstanceCreationEvent**。In this code example, the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. summary.span: 出现新事件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a new event arrives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件数据Event Data 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量包含数据与此事件。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 以下属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (继承自) (inherited from )|获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||获取上次传递的 WMI 事件。Gets the WMI event that was delivered.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于事件的条件。

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含应用于事件的查询。

span.span: Returns an that contains the query to apply to events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 要应用于事件，等同于的条件*事件查询*。The criteria to apply to the events, which is equal to the *event query*. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示客户端如何接收通知的实例时**Win32_Process**由于事件类是创建**__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_Query.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_Query/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_Query.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::ManagementScope ^ Scope { System::Management::ManagementScope ^ get(); void set(System::Management::ManagementScope ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在其中监视事件的范围（命名空间或范围）。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope in which to watch for events (namespace or scope).

value.span: 返回一个 ，它包含要在其中监视事件的范围。

span.span: Returns a that contains the scope the in which to watch for events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value 要在其中监视的事件 （命名空间或范围） 作用域。The scope in which to watch for events (namespace or scope). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示客户端如何接收通知的实例时**Win32_Process**由于事件类是创建**__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. summary.span: 使用给定查询预订事件，并通过 事件异步传递它们。

span.span: Subscribes to events with the given query and delivers them, asynchronously, through the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: 取消预订而不管它是同步还是异步。

span.span: Cancels the subscription whether it is synchronous or asynchronous.

summary.span: 取消预订时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a subscription is canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 事件数据Event Data 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量包含数据与此事件。The event handler receives an argument of type containing data related to this event. 以下属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。The following properties provide information specific to this event. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| | (继承自) (inherited from )|获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.| ||获取操作的完成状态。Gets the completion status of the operation.| ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Management.ManagementBaseObject WaitForNextEvent() cil managed

summary.span: 等待出现下一个与指定的查询匹配的事件，然后将该事件返回。

span.span: Waits for the next event that matches the specified query to arrive, and then returns it.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示刚到达的事件。

span.span: A representing the newly arrived event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事件观察程序对象包含与指定的超时时间的选项，API 将等待下一个事件仅为指定的时间; 量否则，将阻止 API，直到发生下一个事件。If the event watcher object contains options with a specified time-out, the API will wait for the next event only for the specified amount of time; otherwise, the API will be blocked until the next event occurs. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示客户端如何接收通知的实例时**Win32_Process**由于事件类是创建**__InstanceCreationEvent**。The following example shows how the client receives notification when an instance of **Win32_Process** is created because the event class is **__InstanceCreationEvent**. 有关详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的 Windows Management Instrumentation 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information, see the Windows Management Instrumentation documentation in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. 客户端通过调用 方法来同步接收事件。The client receives events synchronously by calling the method. 在运行此代码示例的同时，可以启动进程（如记事本）来测试此示例。This example can be tested by starting a process, such as Notepad, while the example code is running. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/cs/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent/vb/ManagementEventWatcher_WaitForNextEvent.vb#1)]
